whatIs.title: What is LegalHelp AI?
whatIs.description: LegalHelp AI is DocumentoIQ's specialized product designed specifically for notaries. It uses artificial intelligence to analyze extensive notarial documents, identify critical information, and structure relevant data, helping notaries and their teams work with greater precision, speed, and confidence.
whatIs.disclaimer: LegalHelp AI does not replace the notary. It works as an intelligent assistant that reduces manual workload and errors in document review.
